Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
EDGEBROOK ESTATE, CLYDE: **FULLY TITLED & READY TO GO** Requiring an estate offering family-friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? This is definitely affordable buying for first timers so take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This low maintenance parcel of land offers an overall land size of 213m2 with a frontage of 8.5m. With plenty of award-winning designs to pick from any builder will have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation.
Whether you are a young couple looking to break into the market, an established family needing extra room or someone who's seeking a lifestyle change it's all here at this thriving new development. Within Edgebrook there are planned parks with playgrounds, BBQ's and public artworks. It's an estate where community spirit will thrive. This vision will come to life with a carefully designed masterplan and future central park. Planned creek-front walkways and bikeways within the estate will encourage active lifestyles, whilst there are countless recreational and sporting facilities nearby.
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this outstanding opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre which offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!

Description:
Family home, Big block, Move in now!
This deceptively large Burbank home is just 4 years old and sits on a rare 575msq block. It is immaculately presented, with a superb build quality with many upgraded features. Situated in a quiet court in the sought after Pasadena Estate. Entering this property , you appreciate the quality of this much loved family home, with high ceilings, modern grey timber floors, caeser stone upgrades throughout the home, quality tiles, carpets and soft furnishings which is beautifully decorated in a neutral palette encapsulating modern design so you have the added benefit of moving in, relaxing and enjoying this stunning home.
With 4 bedrooms, a large study and 3 separate living areas, it is perfect for any growing family. The master bedroom is a haven to unwind, with a large walk in robe and ensuite with a double size shower to give a touch of luxury. 3 bedrooms, a family bathroom, wc and a rumpus room sits at the back of the house with stacking doors leading to the garden. This well designed floorplan provides flexible living, with a formal lounge, family room and separate retreat for kids, teenagers or guests.
The kitchen has been upgraded with caeser stone benches, a large island unit with waterfall sides and a pop of colour with the glass splash back. A chef's 900mm gas hob and electric oven and ample cupboard and pantry space. Open plan living, with the dining and family room in the heart of the home, this space is flooded with light. Sliding doors lead to the decked area with pergola and landscaped gardens.
With ducted heating and split system cooling, double glazing and internal access to the garage. This home has so many extra's and it doesn't disappoint outside, with the added benefit of only having neighbours at either side its very private. Gated side access for a trailer, parking for 3 cars and a boat, double remote garage and a flat garden, which is fully landscaped on a 575m2 block, giving plenty of space for the family to enjoy.
With the convenience of Coles Shopping Centre, great cafes, parks, transport, schools, sporting clubs and sporting facilities all within walking distance, a short drive to the train station or access to the Monash Freeway for the city. Do not delay in viewing this property.
Insights: 24 Green Gully Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Room to move!
Spacious is one word to describe this incredible young townhouse. With an amazingly light filled living areas you will instantly want to call this your property your own after just one look. Its location is perfect with just a short stroll and you have all the shopping needs covered at the newly constructed Coles Clyde North plus an abundance of schools, childcare and early learning centres all nearby make this property a clear standout! Some features include:
*2 Bedrooms
- Upstairs Study
- Ensuite to master
- Main bathroom upstairs
*Additional downstairs toilet.
*Open plan living and meals rooms
*Generous kitchen
- Overhead cupboards
- Dishwasher
- Stainless Steel appliances
*Gas heating
*Colourbond Pergola
*Double Garage / Carport Semi enclosed
*Great size low maintenance yard
This property would be ideal for the young first home buyer, intelligent investor or even those looking to downsize and be closer to the young grand-kids!
Inspections are available each weekend and also by private viewing as requested.
Priced to sell inline with current market conditions this property represents value unlike any other in the immediate area.
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? ** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our business development manager Jess Sparks has appraised this property at $340-$360p/w ($1477-$1564pcm) for more details about leasing contact Jess on 03 9705 3000 today.
** Arranging an Inspection is easy! Please refer to the instructions below to book your inspection online**
**To book an appointment to view this property, please click on the "Book an inspection" button and register your details and we will instantly respond to you with available inspection times. You MUST register or the appointment time may not go ahead. If no appointment time is available please register and we will notify you as soon as a time becomes available. **

Description:
A Rare Gem in Pasadena Estate!
This double story modern property is conveniently located and beautifully built offering a free functional floor plan and neutral colour palette to suit everyone's taste. Entering the two storey townhouse you can see the property has been kept in immaculate condition.
Downstairs you will find the open plan living and dining area leading to the generously sized kitchen. The kitchen comes with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, glass splash back with abundance of cupboard and bench space.
The inviting family and meals area overlooks the courtyard where you can relax after a hard day's work. An additional laundry with storage is also located downstairs.
Upstairs you will find 2 bedrooms and a study nook, master bedroom with full ensuite and built in robes. The second well sized bedroom with built in robes and access to the stylish central bathroom with toilet.
Further extras include:
- Gas heating wall furnace
- 2 x Split System Air Conditioner
- Quality fixtures & fittings throughout
- 900mm Gas Cooktop and Oven
- Remote Controlled Double Garage that opens into the courtyard
- Down lights throughout
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore with Casey fields and Casey RACE only a stone throw away. This property is just around the corner from Clyde village shopping centre. The modern features and convenient location makes it ideal as an investment or perfect for those looking for their first home or downsizing.
Privacy: Your entry to this property provides consent to the collection and use of personal information for security purposes. It may also be used to provide you with further information about the property, other properties and services marketed by Eview Group | Casey Estate Agents. Please advise our consultant if you do not wish to receive further information. Our full privacy statement is available at our office or online at www.eview.casey.com.au. We have not verified the accuracy of the information contained within. You should not rely on this brochure as proof of the facts stated. You should independently verify the matters stated in this brochure before making your decision to purchase. Description:
listedAS - TITLED 448M2 Block in Edgebrook Estate
A 448m2 Titled Block of Land in the "Edgebrook" Estate with a generous 14m frontage to build your dream home. Located just 55kms from South of Melbourne City, Edgebrook is destined to become a thriving new city within Melbournes fast growing south-eastern suburb. With the option of 8 Schools located in 8Kms. Close to other amenities such as shops, medical and recreational facilities. Public transport available via Cranbourne Station.
This block of land is boosting potential give us a call to make an offer today
Our signs are everywhere... For more Real Estate in Clyde contact your Area Specialist.

Description:
I'm over here!!!!! As New!
If homes could talk then that's what this home would be yelling at you. If you're after a low maintenance, great value, near new home then, don't look past this one.
Located in the beautiful Hartleigh Estate this near new property is an excellent opportunity for first home buyers' investors or downsizers. Comprising of 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, other bedrooms with BIRs, 2 living areas and a great sized stone island bench kitchen, ample cupboards. Second Living is open planned with kitchen, dining and family area. Just move in. The home is on a great sized block and is jam packed with features including gas heating, remote double garage. Don't let this opportunity pass.

Description:
49sq OF LUXURY LIVING- 4 BEDROOM, 4 BATHROOMS, 4 LIVING!
CLYDE: If you are looking for a home that will fit the entire family, with all the creature comforts, then this home is yours for the taking. The sensational floorplan oozes comfort and class from the minute you walk in the front door, allowing you the opportunity to unpack and relax!
Ideally suited to growing families this home features 4 great size bedrooms all complete with their very own full ensuite and WIR; the master suite is in a class of its own, with huge retreat style features that will need to be seen to be believed.
If you are a firm believer that the kitchen is the heart of the home then you won't be disappointed. With 2 kitchens on offer, no home chef will be disappointed. The main kitchen is complete with all the mod inclusions including stone bench tops, generous cupboard space plus quality stainless steel appliances including gas cook top, double oven, convection microwave/oven & dishwasher. The butler's gallery is complete with free standing 900mm S/S oven and cooktop, heaps of cupboard and bench space and an extra sink all finished off with a massive walk in pantry.
If you need multiple living zones then your wish is my command! With a total of 4 true living areas plus a huge open study that can be doubled up as a 5th living area there is sure to be enough space for all. Added internal extras include: ducted heating, evap cooling, powder room downstairs, neutral tones, quality floor coverings throughout including tiles and floorboards.
Step outside and enjoy the alfresco area, perfect for entertaining all year round. The low maintenance landscaping allows you to put your spin on it, but still has enough room for the kids and pets to run amuck, all this is positioned on a 544m2 app block.
Sensational location nearby to family parkland and only a short drive to established shopping facilities, kindergartens, schools, sport and recreation facilities & public transport. There is also easy access to both Fountain Gate and the recently refurbished Cranbourne Park shopping center, and you can take full advantage of the easy freeway access if you happen to work in the CBD!
If you want your family to have the very best in entertainment, education and recreation inspect before it's SELLING, SELLING, SOLD!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable terms and conditions.

Description:
Keep the world at bay in contemporary Belmond on Clyde home
If you're looking for peaceful streets, leafy parks and modern design then this property is for you. This Metricon home is located in the new development, Belmond on Clyde, a sanctuary for those looking to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life; with rolling hills as your backdrop you're guaranteed to find serenity in this gorgeous home.
With 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and superb contemporary design, this house is guaranteed to impress the discerning buyer; as you reach the property, you're greeted with landscaped gardens and an appealing façade.
A light filled, spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen space, complete with beautiful dark wooden floors, makes for comfortable yet sophisticated living. The kitchen is sleek and stylish with high-quality stainless-steel appliances, including a dishwasher, a stone bench top and breakfast bar.
3 good sized bedrooms include carpeted floors, BIR's and privacy blinds, with the spacious master having a large WIR and chic en suite. The property's 2 bathrooms are beautifully finished with high quality fittings; the shared bathroom features a bath with a separate laundry including storage space.
Large sliding doors open up to a covered outdoor area that leads into a good-sized, low maintenance garden; modern living has never been better.
Main features include:
- 3 good size, comfortable bedrooms complete with carpeted floors, BIR's and privacy blinds
- Spacious master bedroom with WIR and ensuite
- 2 beautifully finished bathrooms with high quality fittings
- Open plan kitchen, dining and living
- Super stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher
- Ducted heating throughout
- Gorgeous dark wooden floors through the kitchen, dining and living areas
- Covered outdoor space for enjoyable family living
- Remote double garage with entry to the house for ultimate convenience
- Low maintenance, landscaped garden
Located close to everything that your family needs, including schools, parks and Cranbourne shopping centre.
This property will get snapped up quickly so don't hesitate. Get in touch with Taran Mahal on 0425 073 334 today!

Description:
Immaculate Family Home
Situated within the much admired Eliston Estate, this divine Carlisle built family home is sure to impress the most particular of buyers with its functional floor plan and abundance of features, with nothing more to do but move in.
Behind its delightful landscaped frontage this property offers two separate living areas, 4 generous bedrooms, master with full ensuite, double vanities plus a large walk-in robe. Remaining 3 bedrooms are generously proportioned and complemented by built in robes and the stylish family bathroom.
The heart of this home is the incredibly impressive and tastefully designed kitchen with stones bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, and excellent amount of cupboard and bench space with built in pantry. Beyond the kitchen, you will find the family living / dining area which has all the space required for easy entertaining. Easy access to outside which offers low maintenance gardens and grassed backyard for the kids to play.
Further Features included in this home are:
- Neutral colour scheme throughout
- Evaporative cooling
- Gas ducted heating
- Mix of tiles and carpet flooring
- Remote double garage with internal access
- Security CCTV and Alarm System
- Exposed aggregate driveway
- Down lights
- Alfresco with extended decked area
Eliston is an estate that is within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne. You are also only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by, whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Not to mention the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
This is the perfect opportunity for first timers looking to break into the market, empty nesters and those looking to invest in one of the most popular estates in Clyde!

Description:
Single-Level Temptation With Space, Style And Location
Offering a perfect blend of privacy, space and low-maintenance living, this single-level home captures the essence of a modern and comfortable lifestyle in the prestigious Hartleigh Estate.
A warm colour palette creates a positive ambience in the generous open-plan living and dining room that flows outside to a serene pergola-covered deck for year-round alfresco enjoyment and entertaining. Offering an effortless cooking experience, the sleek kitchen looks onto the living area and is equipped with stainless-steel appliances and stone benchtops. The main bedroom is beautifully finished with a walk-in robe and ensuite bathroom with a large shower and stone vanity. Two more bedrooms are fitted with robes and share a second equally stylish bathroom appointed with a bath, separate shower, stone vanity and toilet.
Living so close to bus stops, shopping centres, parks and schools, first homeowners, young families, downsizers and investors will relish the opportunity to make this stylish, ready-to-move-into home their own.
• Open-plan living and dining room floored in floating timber
• Kitchen appointed with stone benchtops, 900mm stainless-steel oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher
• Alfresco area with pergola covered deck and decked seating
• Carpeted main bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite bathroom with generously sized shower, stone vanity and toilet
• Two additional privately zoned carpeted bedrooms fitted with built-in robes
• Family bathroom with bath, shower, stone vanity and toilet
• Double garage with direct entry
• Ducted heating
• 9ft Ceilings throughout
Location: Positioned in a whisper-quiet location close to Clyde Primary School, Cranbourne East Secondary School, Cranbourne Station, bus stops, Clyde Shopping Complex, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Lineham Oval, Casey Field.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Young, stylish living in Hartleigh
An exciting opportunity has arisen for those seeking a modern, convenient and low maintenance lifestyle with this 1 year young, Porter Davis built home. Proudly positioned in the Hartleigh Estate and within close proximity to an abundance of amenities and facilities nearby.
- Spacious open plan living
- Stunning kitchen complete with stone benches and quality appliances
- Low maintenance landscaped gardens front and rear
Located within close distance to parks, wetlands and walking tracks as well as plenty of Schooling both Primary and Secondary, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Fields and Casey RACE Recreation and Aquatic Centre, public transport, easy access to the Monash Freeway and other major road arterials.

Description:
East facing home in Pasadena
Located in the well sought-after Pasadena estate, this quality built 3 year old home has features galore with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the modern features and convenient location makes it an ideal choice!
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom with ensuite plus a large walk in robe
- Open plan living with central kitchen and dining area
- Separate living/theatre room
- Hostess kitchen includes stainless steel 900mm cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone benchtops with breakfast bar and built in pantry
- Central Family bathroom
- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout
- Double remote garage with internal access and external access
- Other features: Timber flooring, beautiful decking under the outdoor alfresco area & low maintenance gardens
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful childrens parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moments drive to local schools such as St Thomas the Apostle Primary School and not to mention the property is literally across the road from Shopping on Clyde which features restaurants, cafes and a Coles supermarket never drive to the shops again!
Insights: 93 Bimberry Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
BELMOND ON CLYDE - Searching for a tranquil location? Requiring an estate offering family-friendly living? Wanting to be within a brief drive to major shopping facilities and freeway access? 32 Grande Belmond Avenue is definitely affordable buying for first timers to take advantage of the Government Grants on offer and buy with confidence today!
This titled allotment is truly a prime piece of real estate and provides the perfect foundation to create your dream home whilst enjoying the quality lifestyle on offer at Belmond on Clyde (now officially sold out). Allowing for a carefree lifestyle the land itself measures app. 263m2, is regular in shape and provides a frontage of approx. 12.5m and a depth of app. 21.1m. With plenty of award-winning designs to pick from any builder would have a huge selection of floor plans sure to suit your current situation. What are you waiting for? Contact your builder today and get ready to start pouring the slab!
An intimate and quiet community, Belmond offers you the perfect escape right in the heart of Casey. With an array of shopping, community and education choices at your fingertips, this is the perfect place to call home.
With peaceful streets, a picturesque central park and app. 3.7 hectares of open space all nestled amongst rolling hills this is a sanctuary that will keep the world at bay and provide you with a sense of security and privacy!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne Belmond on Clyde is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and the Casey Indoor Sports Centre! With further shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of funky cafes and restaurants. Those of you who work or enjoy wining and dining in the CBD will certainly appreciate the nearby freeway facilities - it's only a brisk app. 45 minute drive away!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's selling, selling ..... SOLD!
CONTACT US TO ARRANGE FOR A TIME TO VIEW THE SECTION 32 VENDOR STATEMENT!

Description:
TITLED LAND IN EDGEBROOK ESTATE
CLYDE: Edgebrook is situated approximately 5 minutes away from two shopping centres with supermarkets and specialty stores. There are proposed creek-front walkways and bike ways within the community which will support active lifestyles.
- Clyde primary school and St Peters college Cranbourne campus are approximately five minutes drive away from the Estatde
- Casey Grammar is approximately ten minutes drive away from the Estatde
- Hillcrest Christian College is approximately twelve minutes drive away from the Estatde
